patthana1.20:8.1: Atītārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.20:8.2: atītārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā.
patthana1.20:8.5: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe atītārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā. #1
patthana1.20:9.1: Anāgatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.20:9.2: anāgatārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhā. #1
patthana1.20:10.1: Paccuppannārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.20:10.2: paccuppannārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhā.
patthana1.20:10.5: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe paccuppannārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhā. #1
patthana1.20:12.1: Atītārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā …
patthana1.20:12.12: vipākapaccayā (vipākaṃ atītārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ, tissopi pañhā paripuṇṇā. Pavattipaṭisandhi kātabbā) …
patthana1.20:15.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … (sabbattha tīṇi), vigate tīṇi, avigate tīṇi.
patthana1.20:20.1: Atītārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.20:20.2: ahetukaṃ atītārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.20:20.8: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana1.20:21.1: Anāgatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.20:21.2: ahetukaṃ anāgatārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.20:21.6: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana1.20:22.1: Paccuppannārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.20:22.2: ahetukaṃ paccuppannārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.20:22.8: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana1.20:24.1: Atītārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā.
patthana1.20:26.1: Atītārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—
patthana1.20:26.2: arūpe atītārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.20:27.1: Anāgatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—
patthana1.20:27.2: arūpe anāgatārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana1.20:28.1: Paccuppannārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—
patthana1.20:28.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe paccuppannārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana1.20:30.1: Atītārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati napacchājātapaccayā …
patthana1.20:31.1: Anāgatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana1.20:32.1: Paccuppannārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana1.20:34.1: Atītārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā … pe ….
patthana1.20:36.1: Paccuppannārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati najhānapaccayā—
patthana1.20:36.2: pañcaviññāṇasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana1.20:38.1: Atītārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati namaggapaccayā—
patthana1.20:38.2: ahetukaṃ atītārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe ….
patthana1.20:40.1: Atītārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—
patthana1.20:40.2: arūpe atītārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana1.20:41.1: Anāgatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—
patthana1.20:41.2: arūpe anāgatārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana1.20:44.1: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naadhipatiyā napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke tīṇi, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge tīṇi, navippayutte dve.
patthana1.20:48.1: Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā tīṇi, napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke tīṇi, navippayutte dve.
patthana1.20:51.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … (sabbattha tīṇi) avigate tīṇi.
patthana1.20:59.1: Atītārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.20:59.2: atītārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:59.3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe atītārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.20:60.1: Anāgatārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.20:60.2: anāgatārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.20:61.1: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.20:61.2: paccuppannārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:61.3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe paccuppannārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.20:63.1: Atītārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.20:63.6: Ariyā atītārammaṇe pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.20:63.7: Atītārammaṇe atīte khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.20:63.8: taṃ ārabbha atītārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi … pe …
patthana1.20:63.15: Atītārammaṇā atītā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.20:64.1: Atītārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.20:64.3: Atītārammaṇaṃ anāgataṃ iddhividhañāṇaṃ paccavekkhati, cetopariyañāṇaṃ … pe …
patthana1.20:64.8: Atītārammaṇe anāgate khandhe aniccato … pe … vipassati, assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.20:64.11: taṃ ārabbha anāgatārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.20:64.14: Atītārammaṇā anāgatā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.20:65.1: Atītārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.20:65.3: Atītārammaṇā paccuppannā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.20:66.1: Anāgatārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.20:66.2: anāgatārammaṇaṃ anāgataṃ iddhividhañāṇaṃ paccavekkhati, cetopariyañāṇaṃ … pe …
patthana1.20:66.6: anāgatārammaṇe anāgate khandhe aniccato … pe … vipassati, assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.20:66.9: taṃ ārabbha anāgatārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.20:66.12: Anāgatārammaṇā anāgatā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.20:67.1: Anāgatārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.20:67.5: ariyā anāgatārammaṇe pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.20:67.7: Anāgatārammaṇe atīte khandhe aniccato … pe … vipassati, assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.20:67.10: taṃ ārabbha atītārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.20:67.13: Anāgatārammaṇā atītā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.20:68.1: Anāgatārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.20:68.3: Anāgatārammaṇā paccuppannā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.20:69.1: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.20:69.3: Paccuppannārammaṇā paccuppannā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.20:70.1: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.20:70.2: atītaṃ dibbaṃ cakkhuṃ paccavekkhati, dibbaṃ sotadhātuṃ paccavekkhati, paccuppannārammaṇaṃ atītaṃ iddhividhañāṇaṃ paccavekkhati, cetopariyañāṇaṃ paccavekkhati.
patthana1.20:70.3: Ariyā paccuppannārammaṇe pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.20:70.4: Paccuppannārammaṇe atīte khandhe aniccato … pe … vipassati, assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.20:70.7: taṃ ārabbha atītārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.20:70.10: Paccuppannārammaṇā atītā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.20:71.1: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.20:71.2: anāgataṃ dibbaṃ cakkhuṃ paccavekkhati, dibbaṃ sotadhātuṃ paccavekkhati, paccuppannārammaṇaṃ anāgataṃ iddhividhañāṇaṃ paccavekkhati, cetopariyañāṇaṃ … pe …
patthana1.20:71.4: paccuppannārammaṇe anāgate khandhe aniccato … pe … vipassati … pe …
patthana1.20:71.8: taṃ ārabbha anāgatārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.20:71.11: Paccuppannārammaṇā anāgatā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.20:73.1: Atītārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.20:73.4: atītaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati.
patthana1.20:73.5: Atītārammaṇaṃ atītaṃ iddhividhañāṇaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, cetopariyañāṇaṃ … pe …
patthana1.20:73.10: Atītārammaṇe atīte khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā atītārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.20:74.1: Atītārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:74.7: atītārammaṇaṃ anāgataṃ iddhividhañāṇaṃ garuṃ katvā … pe …
patthana1.20:74.15: atītārammaṇe anāgate khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.20:74.16: taṃ garuṃ katvā anāgatārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. #2
patthana1.20:75.1: Anāgatārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.20:75.4: anāgatārammaṇaṃ anāgataṃ iddhividhañāṇaṃ garuṃ katvā … pe …
patthana1.20:75.9: Anāgatārammaṇe anāgate khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.20:75.10: taṃ garuṃ katvā anāgatārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.20:76.1: Anāgatārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:76.3: anāgatārammaṇaṃ atītaṃ iddhividhañāṇaṃ garuṃ katvā … pe …
patthana1.20:76.9: anāgatārammaṇe atīte khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.20:76.10: taṃ garuṃ katvā atītārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. #2
patthana1.20:77.1: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:78.1: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:78.3: atītaṃ dibbaṃ cakkhuṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, dibbaṃ sotadhātuṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, paccuppannārammaṇaṃ atītaṃ iddhividhañāṇaṃ garuṃ katvā … pe …
patthana1.20:78.7: paccuppannārammaṇe atīte khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.20:78.8: taṃ garuṃ katvā atītārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. #2
patthana1.20:79.1: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:79.3: anāgataṃ dibbaṃ cakkhuṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, dibbaṃ sotadhātuṃ garuṃ katvā … pe …
patthana1.20:79.5: paccuppannārammaṇaṃ anāgataṃ iddhividhañāṇaṃ garuṃ katvā … pe …
patthana1.20:79.9: paccuppannārammaṇe anāgate khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.20:79.10: taṃ garuṃ katvā anāgatārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. #3
patthana1.20:81.1: Atītārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.20:81.2: purimā purimā atītārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ atītārammaṇānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.20:82.1: Atītārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.20:82.2: atītārammaṇaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ anāgatārammaṇāya āvajjanāya anantarapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.20:83.1: Atītārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.20:83.2: atītārammaṇaṃ cuticittaṃ paccuppannārammaṇassa paṭisandhicittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:83.3: Atītārammaṇaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ paccuppannārammaṇāya āvajjanāya anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.20:84.1: Anāgatārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.20:84.2: purimā purimā anāgatārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ anāgatārammaṇānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.20:85.1: Anāgatārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.20:85.8: anāgatārammaṇā khandhā atītārammaṇassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.20:86.1: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.20:86.2: purimā purimā paccuppannārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ paccuppannārammaṇānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:86.5: paccuppannārammaṇaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ paccuppannārammaṇassa bhavaṅgassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.20:87.1: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.20:87.6: paccuppannārammaṇā khandhā atītārammaṇassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.20:89.1: Atītārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:91.1: Atītārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … nissayapaccayena paccayo ….
patthana1.20:93.1: Atītārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.20:93.5: atītārammaṇā aniccānupassanā, dukkhānupassanā, anattānupassanā atītārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya, dukkhānupassanāya, anattānupassanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.20:94.1: Atītārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.20:94.5: atītārammaṇā aniccānupassanā, dukkhānupassanā, anattānupassanā anāgatārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya, dukkhānupassanāya, anattānupassanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.20:95.1: Atītārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.20:95.5: atītārammaṇā aniccānupassanā, dukkhānupassanā, anattānupassanā paccuppannārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya, dukkhānupassanāya, anattānupassanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.20:96.1: Anāgatārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.20:96.5: anāgatārammaṇā aniccānupassanā, dukkhānupassanā, anattānupassanā anāgatārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya, dukkhānupassanāya, anattānupassanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.20:97.1: Anāgatārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.20:97.5: anāgatārammaṇā aniccānupassanā, dukkhānupassanā, anattānupassanā atītārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya, dukkhānupassanāya, anattānupassanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #2

patthana1.20:98.3: anāgatārammaṇā aniccānupassanā, dukkhānupassanā, anattānupassanā paccuppannārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya, dukkhānupassanāya, anattānupassanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.20:99.1: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.20:99.5: paccuppannārammaṇā aniccānupassanā, dukkhānupassanā, anattānupassanā paccuppannārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya, dukkhānupassanāya, anattānupassanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.20:100.1: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.20:100.5: paccuppannārammaṇā aniccānupassanā, dukkhānupassanā, anattānupassanā atītārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya, dukkhānupassanāya, anattānupassanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.20:101.1: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.20:101.5: paccuppannārammaṇā aniccānupassanā, dukkhānupassanā, anattānupassanā anāgatārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya, dukkhānupassanāya, anattānupassanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.20:103.1: Atītārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.20:103.2: purimā purimā atītārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ atītārammaṇānaṃ khandhānaṃ āsevanapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.20:104.1: Anāgatārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.20:104.2: purimā purimā anāgatārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ anāgatārammaṇānaṃ khandhānaṃ āsevanapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.20:105.1: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.20:105.2: purimā purimā paccuppannārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ paccuppannārammaṇānaṃ khandhānaṃ āsevanapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.20:107.1: Atītārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.20:107.4: atītārammaṇā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:107.8: atītārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṃ atītārammaṇānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #1

patthana1.20:113.4: paccuppannārammaṇā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.20:114.1: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:114.3: paccuppannārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṃ atītārammaṇānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.20:115.1: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:115.3: paccuppannārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṃ anāgatārammaṇānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.20:117.1: Atītārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo … jhānapaccayena paccayo … maggapaccayena paccayo … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … atthipaccayena paccayo … natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:120.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā satta, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane tīṇi, kamme nava, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye jhāne magge sampayutte tīṇi, atthiyā tīṇi, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate tīṇi.
patthana1.20:123.1: Atītārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.20:124.1: Atītārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.20:125.1: Atītārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.20:126.1: Anāgatārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.20:127.1: Anāgatārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.20:128.1: Anāgatārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.20:129.1: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.20:130.1: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.20:131.1: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.20:135.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare nava, nasamanantare nava (saṃkhittaṃ, sabbattha nava), novigate nava, noavigate nava.
patthana1.20:139.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare naupanissaye napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke tīṇi (sabbattha tīṇi, saṃkhittaṃ), nonatthiyā novigate tīṇi.
patthana1.20:143.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā satta, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane tīṇi, kamme nava, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre indriye jhāne magge sampayutte atthiyā tīṇi, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate tīṇi.
